mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS (PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, STOCK_QUANTITY, REGISTRATION_DATE, ENV_MARK, THUMBNAIL, DETAIL_IMAGE, CATEGORY_NUMBER, DISCOUNT_CODE) VALUES (#{productCode}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{stockQuantity}, #{registrationDate}, #{envMark}, #{thumbnail}, #{detailImage}, #{categoryNumber}, #{discountCode});
